data.persona: I am one of those who have committed crimes. I steal from people when they aren't looking. I am swift and sneaky.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The stained glass glistens in the sun. The pews are lines perfectly.
There's a pew, a stained glass, a Alter, an offering plate, an altar, and a baptismal font here.
The clergyman is here.

You are carrying a purse, and wielding a ritual knife.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to relinquish the ritual knife to the clergyman as a symbol of repentance
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to have the clergyman baptize me
data.long_motivation: I'm going to volunteer to work at the temple and then steal the offerings
